name: Music Events - ReactJS TypeScript
description: This is a portfolio website built with ReactJS and TypeScript. It uses open API for getting events. It is a single page application that uses React Redux, React Hooks and reusable components. The website is hosted on Netlify and the source code is available on GitHub.

name: Lottie Ads App - VueJS
description: This is a web-application, built during my internship at LevelUp. It is a single page application that uses VueJS, Vuex, Vue Router, Vuetify, Lottie, Axios, and reusable components. The application is hosted on Netlify and the source code is available on GitHub.

name: RunProperty OU - Real Estate Web Application
description: This is a web application that I developed during my time at RunProperty. It is a single-page application that utilizes VueJS, Vuex, Vue Router, Axios, and reusable components. The application is hosted on Google Cloud, and its source code is stored in a private repository on GitLab. This application is specifically designed for real estate brokers, with many integrations and exciting features

name: PetStop - Study project
description: This is a university study project using VueJS, Vuex, Vue Router, Vuetify and Axios. The application is a single-page platform hosted on Netlify and its source code is on GitHub. It helps users find petsitters or petsitting jobs.

name: LinkedIn Profile
description: This is my LinkedIn profile. It is a single page application that uses ReactJS, React Redux, React Hooks, and reusable components. The application is hosted on Netlify and the source code is available on GitHub.

name: GitHub Profile
description: This is my GitHub profile. It is a single page application that uses ReactJS, React Redux, React Hooks, and reusable components. The application is hosted on Netlify and the source code is available on GitHub.
